Data Fields
Vps_DispRtParams Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » Display API

Run time configuration structure for the display driver. This needs to be passed along with frame list to update any supported run time parameters. More...

#include <vps_display.h>

Data Fields

Fvid2_PosConfig * posCfg
 
Vps_FrameParams * inFrmPrms
 
Vps_FrameParams * outFrmPrms
 

Detailed Description

Run time configuration structure for the display driver. This needs to be passed along with frame list to update any supported run time parameters.

Field Documentation

Vps_FrameParams* Vps_DispRtParams::inFrmPrms

[IN] Frame params for input frame - used to change the frame width and height at runtime. Note that this is used only when the buffer dimension is smaller than the VENC size. When changing the size, the application should ensure that the startX/startY + the frame size doesn't exceed the display resolution. Pass NULL if no change is required.

Vps_FrameParams* Vps_DispRtParams::outFrmPrms

[IN] Target image Size (o/p of pipeline). only Width and height is valid in this structure. Pass NULL if no change is required.

Fvid2_PosConfig* Vps_DispRtParams::posCfg

[IN] Position configuration used to position the Frame in output window (overlay). Pass NULL if no change is required.
